name: Pigeons (itch)
description:
Pigeon's is a casual Video Game that's heavily influenced by the  Angry Birds franchise. Defend your pigeon nest against the threats of the forest. The snakes have been plotting attacks to take your eggs and now it's time to flight back. 

4 levels in total, each with its own unique fort to destroy, different pigeon types and some awesome upbeat music. Can you beat all the levels? 

Controls: Hold Left click on Pigeon, pull back and release.

Made in a 48h period using a range of free asset packs.  

  • Daniel Oldham (Programmer) Portfolio: https://www.dangodev.com/ 
  • Tilepack:  https://kauzz.itch.io/pixelforest 
  • Pigeon Assets: https://pop-shop-packs.itch.io/pigeons-2d-pixel-asset-pack 
  • Music: https://www.zapsplat.com/music/game-music-action-retro-8-bit-style-bouncy-hard-d...
